description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北大众捷运股份有限公司董事长、矽格股份有限公司共同创办人。
description.en: A political figure from the Republic of China, former chairman of the Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation and co-founder of Sigurd Corporation.

nodes.id: 台北大众捷运股份有限公司

zh-cn: 台北大众捷运股份有限公司

description.zh-cn: 负责营运台北捷运系统的公司。
description.en: The company responsible for operating the Taipei Metro system.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任台北市市长，是李文宗的高中同学。
description.en: A political figure from the Republic of China, former mayor of Taipei City, and a high school classmate of Li Wen-tsung.

nodes.id: 台湾省立新竹高级中学

zh-cn: 台湾省立新竹高级中学

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾新竹市的一所高级中学。
description.en: A senior high school located in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的一所私立大学。
description.en: A private university located in Taipei City, Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 由李文宗与黄兴阳于1996年共同创办的半导体封装和测试服务公司。
description.en: A semiconductor packaging and testing services company co-founded by Li Wen-tsung and Huang Hsing-yang in 1996.

description.zh-cn: 与李文宗共同创办矽格股份有限公司。
description.en: Co-founded Sigurd Corporation with Li Wen-tsung.

description.en: A venture capital company where Li Wen-tsung once served as Chief Technology Officer.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国台北市的最高行政机关。
description.en: The highest administrative body of Taipei City, Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，接替柯文哲担任台北市市长。
description.en: A political figure from the Republic of China, who succeeded Ko Wen-je as Mayor of Taipei City.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党之一。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

nodes.id: 财团法人台北市台湾众望关怀基金会

description.zh-cn: 由台湾民众党人士组成的基金会，李文宗为首任董事长。
description.en: A foundation formed by members of the Taiwan People's Party, with Li Wen-tsung as its first chairman.

description.zh-cn: 李文宗的胞妹。
description.en: Younger sister of Li Wen-tsung.

zh-cn: 木可公关行销有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由李文宗的胞妹李文娟成立的公司。
description.en: A company founded by Li Wen-tsung's younger sister, Li Wen-chuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的一场总统选举，柯文哲为参选人之一。
description.en: A presidential election in the Republic of China, in which Ko Wen-je was a candidate.

description.zh-cn: 一宗涉及柯文哲的政治献金司法案件，李文宗因此案被羁押。
description.en: A legal case involving political donations to Ko Wen-je, which led to the detention of Li Wen-tsung.

description.zh-cn: 前鼎越开发公司董事长，因涉及柯文哲政治献金案与李文宗一同被羁押。
description.en: Former chairman of Dingyue Development Corporation, who was detained along with Li Wen-tsung in connection with the Ko Wen-je political donation case.

description.zh-cn: 台湾台北地方法院检察署。
description.en: The Taiwan Taipei District Prosecutors Office.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的普通法院之一。
description.en: One of the ordinary courts in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 李文宗在台北大众捷运股份有限公司的前任（总经理代理）。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung's predecessor (acting general manager) at the Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 李文宗在台北大众捷运股份有限公司的继任者。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung's successor at the Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation.

description.en: During Ko Wen-je's tenure as Mayor of Taipei, Li Wen-tsung served as his municipal advisor and director of the mayor's office.

description.zh-cn: 在柯文哲参选2024年中华民国总统选举期间，担任其竞选总部财务长。
description.en: Served as the treasurer of Ko Wen-je's campaign headquarters during his run for the 2024 ROC presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 因涉及柯文哲政治献金案，李文宗被羁押。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung was detained in connection with the Ko Wen-je political donation case.

description.zh-cn: 因涉及柯文哲政治献金案，朱亚虎被羁押。
description.en: Chu Ya-hu was detained in connection with the Ko Wen-je political donation case.

description.zh-cn: 台北地检署就柯文哲政治献金案声请羁押李文宗获准。
description.en: The Taipei District Prosecutors Office's request to detain Li Wen-tsung regarding the Ko Wen-je political donation case was approved.

description.zh-cn: 台北地方法院准予李文宗交保。
description.en: The Taipei District Court granted bail to Li Wen-tsung.

description.zh-cn: 李文宗接替颜邦杰（总经理代理）担任台北大众捷运股份有限公司董事长。
description.en: Li Wen-tsung succeeded Yen Pang-chieh (acting general manager) as the chairman of Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 赵绍廉接替李文宗担任台北大众捷运股份有限公司董事长。
description.en: Chao Shao-lien succeeded Li Wen-tsung as the chairman of Taipei Rapid Transit Corporation.
